info.+content: Guts, the Black Swordsman, wanders around in a mediaeval world slaying demons as they are attracted to a demonic mark on his neck. To his help he has inhuman strength gained from a harsh childhood lived with mercenaries, a gigantic sword, an iron prosthetic left hand, and the elf Puck. In his search for vengeance on the one who gave him the mark, he meets many interesting persons and creatures, all of whom are affected by him in one way or another.
『ベルセルク』三浦建太郎 | 白泉社
